org.wise.portal.service.newsitem

Interface NewsItemService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NewsItemServiceImpl

    public interface NewsItemService
    A service for working with NewsItem objects.
    Author:
    Patrick Lawler

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Creates a new NewsItem in the data store.

    • Method Detail

      • createNewsItem

        NewsItem createNewsItem(Date date,
                        User owner,
                        String title,
                        String news,
                        String type)
        Creates a new NewsItem in the data store.
        Parameters:
        date - date news item was created
        owner - user who created this news item
        title - news item title
        news - news item text
        type - news item type
        Returns:
        a NewsItem that was created

      • retrieveAllNewsItem

        List<NewsItem> retrieveAllNewsItem()
        Retrieves all NewsItem from the data store.
        Returns:
        a Set of NewsItem

      • retrieveByType

        List<NewsItem> retrieveByType(String type)
        Retrieves all NewsItem by specified type
        Returns:
        a Set of NewsItem of specified type

      • retrieveById

        NewsItem retrieveById(Integer id)
               throws ObjectNotFoundException
        Retrieves a NewsItem given an ID
        Parameters:
        id - Integer id of news item to retrieve
        Returns:
        NewsItem
        Throws:
        ObjectNotFoundException

      • updateNewsItem

        void updateNewsItem(Integer id,
                    Date date,
                    User owner,
                    String title,
                    String news,
                    String type)
             throws ObjectNotFoundException
        Updates a NewsItem in the data store.
        Parameters:
        id - news item id
        date - date news item was created
        owner - user who created this news item
        title - news item title
        news - news item text
        type - news item type
        Throws:
        ObjectNotFoundException

        Deletes a NewsItem from the data store.
        Parameters:
        newsItemId - Integer
